biotools.summary:
A computational framework for the non-specialist to profile cellular heterogeneity in cytometry datasets.

The immunoCluster package uses the scDataViz bioconductor package’s vizualization tools and adaptation of the SingleCellExperiment data structure to build simple and flexible cytometry analysis workflows like those outlined in Nowicka et al. (2017) CyTOF workflow: differential discovery in high-throughput high-dimensional cytometry datasets.
